data.title: LIN ZE XU (1785-1850) Ink on Paper China , dated 1834 …
data.meta_description:
LIN ZE XU (1785-1850)
Ink on Paper

China , dated 1834


 


Lin Zexu was a famous national hero in the late Qing dynasty. 

Besides being an excellent politician, he was also a talented poet and calligrapher. 

This pair of scrolls was written by him in running script and displays a peaceful autumn scene and his leisurely mood.


 


Dimensions:


84 cm x 34 cm and 133 cm x 31 cm
